title: How Hard to Push

en: You've gotten so much done. It's finally starting to look like a fully-realized product.
However, you're burning the candle at both ends, working for hours without breaks.
Passion and a looming deadline have gotten you this far, but how much longer can you last like this?

no_caption: Not now, not yet. Push harder

en: It would be much worse to get sick and lose the rest of the week. Time to take a break.
Another fix in, another step closer to perfection. Another grey hair, another wrinkle.
